text: The 1931 Kentucky Wildcats football team was an American football team that represented the University of Kentucky in the Southern Conference (SoCon) during the 1931 college football season. In their fifth season under head coach Harry Gamage, the Wildcats compiled a 5–2–2 record (4–2–2 against SoCon opponents), finished sixth in the conference, and outscored opponents by a total of 130 to 48. The team played its home games at McLean Stadium in Lexington, Kentucky. ==Schedule== ==References== Kentucky Category:Kentucky Wildcats football seasons Kentucky Wildcats football
title: 1931 Kentucky Wildcats football team
